page.title: 14INTERVIEW/CONT
page.content: Pheasants are reared to be shot in {Craggs Wood}and sporting rights can be bought. There is a relatively extensive pleasure garden,including a maze built by the present{Lord Eliot}and each year a rock festival called{The {Elephant Fair}is held in the grounds. {The Estate}is haunted by a spectral monk called"{Dando}"who walks the grounds with a pack of ghostly hounds although several people have heard and seen him the present{Lord Eliot}has not witnessed either. {Lord Eliot}claims that{Jesus Christ} slept at the Monastery that preceded the house.Legend says that{Joseph}of Aramehthea came to{Cornwall}in search of tin.If{Joseph}did go to{Glastonbury he would have stopped at{St Germans}. If{Jesus}was{Josephs}runaround as was the custom he would have slept there.
